main event: A bright light shaped like a cigar was observed hovering above tree level in Derry, Texas on October 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was the size of a gallon can., The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The object made no noise during the observation., The object quickly disappeared after hovering., This report is part of the Project Blue Book investigations into UFO sightings.
sighted object: a bright light shaped like a cigar
witness description: a civilian observer with no optical aids used
